title: Naturopathic Medicine
description: We treat the symptoms of illness using natural remedies and therapies to help your body heal itself.
cleaned_text: AS SERIOUS ABOUT YOUR HEALTH AS YOU ARE; RESTORING VIBRANT WELLNESS NATURALLY Dr Michelle focuses on the principles and practices of naturopathic medicine. Naturopathic medicine is an ever evolving system of medicine that incorporates conventional and alternative medicine, utilizing the wisdoms of age old practices like Ayurveda, Biotherapeutic Drainage, Herbal Medicine, Homeopathy, Nature Cure and Pleomorphism to restore and regulate the body's natural harmony and well being. Naturopathic Medicine seeks to identify the root cause of illness and understand that there are often multiple hidden influences that contribute to disease in the body. Underlying sources of illness may include: Anxiety Allergies and sensitivities Bioidentical Hormone Therapy Depression Fatigue Insomnia Nutrition Thyroid conditions Women's Health Lab work and analysis along with autonomic response testing can be used as a means to identify these individual causes. Restoring the body to health is accomplished through removing the toxins via detoxification, rebuilding the digestive system, strengthening the immune system and alkalizing your body through diet to support the proper pH, one of the most important foundations of health. During your initial consultation, Dr. Michelle will work with you to create an unique, individual treatment plan to restore balance to your body. |Monday:||10am - 6pm|
